Articles.Content:
Can KSP2 have Cinematic tools so KSP fans can film cinematics easier without mods? I think this would be a good idea as making good shots in KSP, so I think this would be a good feature. Can this be an update for KSP?

Edited May 4, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal
Opps! Mistakes! Spelling.
it would be nice with a more free cameramode
